comment: Like Andrew said in previous posts, Report, Mute, Move on. I give them NO interaction, that seems to help to keep their shit down to a minimum.
amr:
# ::snt Like Andrew said in previous posts, Report, Mute, Move on. I give them NO interaction, that seems to help to keep their shit down to a minimum.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG2 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Andrew"))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (o / on))
                  :location (p2 / post-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :mod (p3 / previous))))
      :snt2 (ii / interact-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (t / they)
            :ARG0-of (h / help-01
                  :ARG1 (k / keep-04
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (s2 / shit
                              :poss t)
                        :ARG2 (m3 / minimum))
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / seem-01))))
